Package com.CS360.GameCenter

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AboutFragment
    This fragment is used to display the About Us layout
    AllGamesQueryRunnable
    This application carries out the All Games Queries needed to fill the All Games list
    ChangeLogFragment
    This fragment is used to display the About Us layout
    FillDataFragment
    Fragment used to display and operate the new user creation page
    FragmentTab1
    Fragment used to control all operations on Tab 1 (Games)
    FragmentTab2
    Fragment to control all Tab 2 operations
    FragmentTab3
    Fragment to control all Tab 3 operations
    FragmentTab4
    Fragment to control all Tab 3 operations
    GameDataFragment
    Fragment to control all operations on the Game Data Page
    GameListFragment
    Fragment to control all operations on Game List UI
    HelpFragment
    Fragment to display Help page
    LeaderboardFragment
    Leaderboard Fragment to control all leaderboard activities
    LoginFragment
    Fragment to control and display Login UI
    MainActivity
    Main Application Activity
    MyAccountFragment
    Fragment to control the operations on My Account page
    MyGamesQueryRunnable  
    StableArrayAdapter
    Class to use as a stable array adapter for list items
    TabListener
    Class to implement Tab navigation between pages
